room_title: Escape room "The Virus" by Challenge Escape Rooms in New York
room_description: You've volunteered for a drug trial to make a little extra money. The lab mixed up the drugs and instead of a harmless vaccine, you have been infected with a deadly virus. The whole area's been quarantined, and the doctors said you only have an hour left. Your life is now in your hands - will you find the antidote?
